title: $500 vs $50 Captain America Shield Challenge!!
author: Team Edge
description:
Hey guys! In this video, we build our own Captain America shields! One team has $500 and the other has $50! We put our shields to the test by shooting T-shirt canons and paintballs at it! We even have a round where we throw it at Thanos to see which shield penetrates the best! Only one shield will be selected to be the winner! Which shield do you think will be destroyed? Comment down. below! Some other videos you may like are Eating 1 Color Food for 24 hrs | Who will give up first?, We Put in a Ski Slope in the Edge Space!! | Larger Than Life!, and Pull Wrong Tooth & Get EATEN by the CROC!! We have also appeared on Dope or Nope, Rekt, and Battle universe! Who do you think will win??

Team Edge Merchandise! â¡ https://teamedge.store/collections/best-sellers

BLAST the Person Behind the Wall! | TANK Edition! â¡ https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=y5rggbkLzEo


ğŸ”½MORE LINKS BELOW ğŸ”½
TE Twitter â¡ https://goo.gl/rbKKmG
TE Instagram  â¡ https://instagram.com/itsteamedge/

J-Freds Insta! â¡ https://www.instagram.com/itsjfred/?hl=en
Bryans YT Channelâ¡ https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLZPssQhdLX_8JS7ohhNNrkrBpTdgJHB1B&disable_polymer=true

Welcome to Team Edge! 
Heres 3 things we love!
-We love spending time with each other, creating crazy competitions, and having fun doing it! Thats all you'll see on this channel every Tuesday and Friday!
-We love Jesus and believe its our purpose here on earth to spread the good news that he has saved us from our sins. Because we love him its our mission to provide family friendly content that glorifies him!
-We love you. We hope you'll be part of Team Edge and join us for the ride!

Buisness Inquiries: inquiries@teamedgegames.com
